Uses of Class
it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller.action.Action

  • Packages that use Action 
    Package Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller  
    it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller.action  

    • Uses of Action in it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller

      Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller with parameters of type Action 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Controller.execute(Action action)
      The controller gets the Action from the client view and executes it if it is contained in the set of currently available actions that are defined in the current controller State.

      One of our most prized actions, the move let's the player change its current position following precisely the game rules. ...but what happens if a human lands in an escape sector?
